East 1983rd Two men fleeing across the border to West Germany. One is shot, but the others when things on the west side. In East Germany is Katya, the sister of the murdered man, Matthis, and mistress of the survivors Andrew, whose child she is waiting. Stasi troops lurking everywhere, and she dares not leave the country.
